Objective: Verify navigating to Newsletter page from My Account Newsletter link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click 'Subscribe / unsubscribe to newsletter' link
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Newsletter Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Newsletter Page

Objective: Verify navigating to Newsletter page from Newsletter right column options
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Newsletter in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Newsletter Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Newsletter Page

Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Newsletter in right column options
3) Toggle Subscribe button
4) Click Continue
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account Page And a text message 'Success: Your newsletter subscription has been successfully updated!' should be shown
Actual Result: The User is taken to My Account Page And a text message 'Success: Your newsletter subscription has been successfully updated!' is shown

Objective: Verify Back button in Newsletter page discards changes
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Newsletter in right column options
3) Toggle Subscribe button
4) Click Back
5) Click Newsletter in right column options
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account Page and change should be discarded
Actual Result: The User is taken to My Account Page and change is discarded

Objective: Verify registering account with newsletter subscribed
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Register and account with Newsletter field toggled on
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Newsletter in right column options
Expected Result: The Subscribe toggle should be activated

Objective: Verify registering account with newsletter not subscribed
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Register and account with Newsletter field toggled off
2) Click My account header and click My Account
3) Click Newsletter in right column options
Expected Result: The Subscribe toggle should be deactivated

Objective: Verify Back button in Newsletter page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Newsletter in right column options
3) Click Back button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account Page
Actual Result: The User is taken to My Account Page

Objective: Verify the Newsletter Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Newsletter in right column options
3) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Newsletter Page should work in all supported environments
Actual Result: The Newsletter Page works in all supported environments
